timeline.message: Add extractor for web account role

timeline.bodyText: Could this be lower-cased since the contains checks are looking for lower-cased strings? Unless there is a reason this must be case sensitive.
timeline.author: dannysmyda

timeline.bodyText: Very minor point, but should the platform suffix be a bundle message? Or is that part of the proper noun? Same for all instances of platformName variable in the various methods.
timeline.author: dannysmyda

replies.bodyText: I don't think so, since the combination of name + translated "platform" may not make sense in other languages due to word ordering
replies.author: APriestman

timeline.bodyText: I think these should be bundle messages.
timeline.author: dannysmyda

timeline.message:
Change to Bundle message.
Convert to lower case.
